Package state

Class SponsorshipState

Object
state.SponsorshipState
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISponsorshipState
public class SponsorshipState
extends Object
implements ISponsorshipState
SponsorshipState is a concrete implementation of ISponsorshipState.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SponsorshipState()
    Create a new SponsorshipState with an empty list of sponsorship requests, which keeps track of the next request number it will generate, starting from 1 and incrementing by 1 each time a new number is requested
    SponsorshipState​(ISponsorshipState other)
    Copy constructor to create a deep copy of another SponsorshipState instance

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SponsorshipRequest addSponsorshipRequest​(TicketedEvent event)
    Create a new SponsorshipRequest (includes generating a new unique request number) and add it to a TicketedEvent and the sponsorship state
    SponsorshipRequest findRequestByNumber​(long requestNumber)  
    List<SponsorshipRequest> getAllSponsorshipRequests()  
    List<SponsorshipRequest> getPendingSponsorshipRequests()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • SponsorshipState

      public SponsorshipState()
      Create a new SponsorshipState with an empty list of sponsorship requests, which keeps track of the next request number it will generate, starting from 1 and incrementing by 1 each time a new number is requested

      Description copied from interface: ISponsorshipState

      public List<SponsorshipRequest> getPendingSponsorshipRequests()
      Specified by:
      getPendingSponsorshipRequests in interface ISponsorshipState
      Returns:
      List of those SponsorshipRequests that have SponsorshipStatus.PENDING

      public SponsorshipRequest findRequestByNumber​(long requestNumber)
      Specified by:
      findRequestByNumber in interface ISponsorshipState
      Parameters:

      Returns:
